jump_scares.spoiler: Beau is attacked by one of the creatures (while we get some warning the attack is quite loud and violent)
Regan knocks over a lamp during a game of monopoly and the ensuing loud noise during a previously quiet scene may be quite startling for some viewers
There is a loud bang on the roof of the house
As Lee listens by a window, a raccoon suddenly screeches and runs past
A raccoon is suddenly attacked by one of the creatures
As Regan is about to descend the stairs, Lee grabs her and pulls her back
Marcus walks past an old man who is watching him in the background
A creature walks past the doorway above the stairs
The creature makes a loud noise
Evelyn puts a bloodied hand on the shower window startling Lee
As Regan goes to pick up the torch, Marcus grabs her wrist
Marcus falls through a metal door and lands in the grain silo
The creature drops down into the grain silo beside Regan
After a period of silence we see the creature outside the car, the creature then breaks through the window with a loud crash
The creature smashes against the police car while Lee is speaking to Officer Ronnie
A creature lands on a car in front of Evelyn and her kids
As Evelyn blindly drives in reverse, a creature climbs out of a smashed tour bus windshield
The creature leaps towards Officer Ronnie and slams into the police car
Evelyn steps on a trip wire which drops a large rope full of glass bottles
Marcus steps on a bear trap alerting the aliens to the family’s location
Emmett grabs Evelyn as she enters the refinery to silence her as an alien crawls down the wall behind her

Reagan doesn’t hear the creature board the train after she falls backward

A creature rips off the door

As Hank’s gunshot lights up the area the monster is seen kneeling on the ground

Lane suddenly appears in front of Talia and James
Something appears to pull Peter away and the camera footage cuts out

The camera gradually approaches the back of Talia’s head and she suddenly screams

A flash of lightning illuminates the room and a woman can briefly be seen watching James

movies.title: Don’t Be Afraid of the Dark

Buzz bumps into a beam in the dark looking for an exit

The Funhouse electricity kicks on causing the animatronic monsters to move and the loud thunder and lightning sound effects to turn on

The father, impaled on the sword grabs Buzz
Amy is started by the monster-son lurking amongst the Funhouse animatronic characters
The monster breaks through a locked door
A piece of equipment falls from the upper mechanical deck
A wooden ladder slam onto the floor in front of Amy
Even with the power cut, The Fat Lady starts moving and cackling and surprises Amy
The sound of steam releasing from a pump startles Liz

In an homage to both John Carpenter’s classic Halloween (1978) and Hitchcock’s Psycho (1960) young Joey sneaks into the bathroom dressed as a maniacal clown, rips back the shower curtain, raises a knife, and surprises his horrified sister
The son of the carny tears his Frankenstein mask off revealing his disfigured face
Joey is startled by a menacing dog
A magician scares the audience when an volunteer from the audience steps into The Impaler and gets a stake hammered into the her heart
A creepy man offers Joey a ride then unexpectedly points a shotgun at him
Brundlefly bursts through the glass window of the hopsital room where Veronica is about to have an abortion
Brundlefly jumps down from the ceiling onto Borans
Something bangs on the outhouse
An old man appears behind Lynn
Bobby bangs against the caravan
Someone runs past the camera while Bobby is searching for his dog
Doug sees the baby through the window and turns to see a mutant walk from behind the building
As Doug is leaving the building he is a confronted by a mutant
One of the mutants jumps through the door
A mutant jumps through the wall
A mutant jumps onto Doug from above
Claire turns around and is startled by Adam
As Adam takes a photograph, a creature appears in the woods
Adam looks up and Colm is standing on the road
The car trunk suddenly slams down on Adam
A shadowy figure moves past a window
There is a high pitched squawk and Adam shoots his gun
Adam shuts the car bonnet which reveals several creatures standing behind him
Something comes through the keyhole that Adam is looking through and pierces his eye
Adam looks through a crack in the door and sees one of the creatures
A hand breaks through the attic floor
Claire looks up and sees a creature at the window
One of the creatures squeals at Claire
Finn’s face suddenly turns demonic
Adam bangs loudly on the door behind Claire
Adam suddenly grabs Claire’s ankle
Cora screams at Adam
A creature stands up behind Adam and impales him through the stomach
During  mid-credits scene, we see the logging truck drive off while calming music plays only to reveal the creature screeching at the camera

movies.title: The Last Voyage Of The Demeter

jump_scares.spoiler: The quick montage of the various shots of the ship ends with a sudden unrelated shot of Dracula lunging at the camera before the screen cuts to black
Culminating the long suspenseful scene, something suddenly moves inside the pile of dirt, startling Clemens who yelps and jumps back
Olgaren moves the spyglass and sees a closeup of Dracula’s face
Someone grabs Clemens by the shoulder from behind
Dracula moves and jumps at Petrofsky
The hatch of the cargo hold in the foreground of the shot is bumped from below
A flash of lightning reveals Dracula standing behind Larsen
Dracula jumps down at Larsen from the mast above him
A sudden cut from a quiet tense sequence to a closeup of Toby’s fingers opening the door with a loud sound
Olgaren bangs on the door after a drawn out moment of quiet tension
A sudden cut from a quiet tense sequence to a shot with loud voices and frantic movement happening in the foreground
Olgaren snarls and lunges at Clemens
Clemens, Captain Eliot and others see Dracula through the hole in the door
Dracula jumps down and grabs Toby
Abrams is hit in the head from behind
A cut to a closeup of Dracula’s snarling face
Toby’s eyes open, revealing milky white color
After several seconds of suspense, Dracula suddenly flies directly at the camera out of the mist
Captain Eliot turns around to see snarling Dracula right behind him
Something appears behind Heidi
Camera cuts to an old lady
A strange baby-like creature with extra extremities starts screeching
The Fouke Monster unexpectedly opens a window and reaches its hand inside at the family
The Fouke Monster hits the bathroom window
As Bobby walks back towards the house, he suddenly runs into the Fouke Monster
A creature lands on the window
There is a loud clanking noise
One of the group is grabbed from behind by a man trapped in a spider web
The returning group bang on the door of the supermarket
The soldier outside the supermarket is taken away suddenly by a creature
John turns around and Louisa is no longer in bed. There is a flash of lightning and suddenly Louisa is standing right beside him
John opens a ball and a spider crawls out
There is a loud thunderclap
Something moves across the road in front of John’s car
A stone hits the car window, startling John
A shadow moves past Sam in the attic and he falls of the ladder
John shines the torch around the room and is surprised by a man watching him
The officer slams the breaks on suddenly as something appears in front of the car
The officer is attacked after he puts his head out the window
A creature breaks through the window
John shoots a creature as it comes through a doorway
An explosion in the sand scares rick
As Evy is searching where a sound comes from a skeleton pops up with a very loud sound effect (but it turns out to be a joke from Jonathan)
Rick throws a bag on the table scaring Evy
When Evy comes up from picking her brush, Hook from the Medjai is suddenly behind her
When Rick and the group turns around the group of Americans are pointing guns at them
A mild jump scare when Jonathan suddenly takes his hand out of his bag
When Rick and Jonathan first open Imhotep’s sarcophagus, his wet corpse pops out
When Evy reads from the book of the dead Imhotep´s corpse suddenly wakes up and lets out a roar
A shadow suddenly passes by
The ground suddenly shakes
A hand pops out of the ground
Mr. Daniels checks the window and suddenly a sandstorm blows towards him
When Rick decapitates a mummy, the mummy holds his head and Rick then slams the sword to the head causing the mummy´s head to fly towards the screen
Anck Su Namun pops up behind Rick and Evy
Evy runs into Anck Su Namuns
The security camera suddenly starts glitching
After Danielle says, “what’s happening to me?” it suddenly cuts back to the glitching security camera
A burnt hand appears from out of the pool
Illyana opens the door to find a picture of the smiley man on the wall. (Not really a classic jump scare, but still may startle some
The scene cuts to a loud shower after a freaky scene
The bear reappears over the closet and yells
Kathy’s car hits something on the road
A severed arm lands on the windscreen
During a tense scene Lizzy’s toy starts playing a song
The monster breaks through the window and pulls Kathy out of the car
The ambulance medic falls onto the windscreen
A hand reaches into the ambulance and pulls the driver out
The monster slams into the side of the ambulance as it drives away
Over the next 20 seconds or so there are several loud bangs on the exterior of the ambulance
The monster drops down in front of Kathy and Lizzy
The creature suddenly tackles Kathy
The creature roars at Lizzy as she approaches it
Accompanied by a sound effect, the group see a mangled animal corpse in the trees
Luke stands outside the cabin for a few seconds after he hears noises from the woods. Hutch then appears behind him and calls out “Luke” which may startle some viewers
Phil approaches the upstairs door but before he can enter Dom makes a loud noise by breaking a chair
During Luke’s dream there is a sharp high pitched noise
The liquor shelf suddenly falls away and Luke wakes up
Luke sees some slight movement behind the trees and a sound effect plays (although nothing particularly scary occurs on screen)
Accompanied by a sound effect, Luke sees some fluorescent lights flicker
Luke sees the neighboring tent flung into the air
Luke calls out to Phil and immediately after Phil is taken by the beast
Accompanied by a sound effect, Luke sees Dom hiding behind a tree trunk
The beast breaks through the trees in front of Luke and Dom
A door loudly bursts open
Dom looks back at his wife who has now transformed into the beast
One of the corpses suddenly moves slightly (this is accompanied by a sharp sound effect)
Luke gets to his feet and attempts to hobble away but the beast jumps down beside him
One of the workers appears in front of the camera
A sphinx creature runs across the screen while shrieking
A large brick falls on Zahir after he says “What the hell is wrong with you, man?
The sphinx runs across the screen again
The Anubis appears out of the hole and begins to pull the soldier in
The large hanging brick that Holden is investigating falls down
Holden is impaled by the Anubis after he says “We have to keep going.
The Anubis quickly turns toward the camera
The Anubis walks around the corner while growling
Fitzie places his hand over Nora’s mouth
As the camera’s light comes back on the Anubis jumps towards it
The Anubis jumps out of the hole and grabs Nora
After Nora calls out to Fitzie the Anubis crushes his face
As the boy turns around The Anubis jumps at him
As the speaking character turns around to face the camera, they are unexpectedly shot in the chest in the middle of a calm monologue with no warning
As a character slowly backs into a large window behind them, a giant fleshy tentacle suddenly slams against it from the other side

While a character screams a triumphant phrase, a giant tentacle suddenly falls on them with a loud thud and squishes them, halting the uplifting music score and instantly shifting the tone of the scene
Elisa touches the outside of the tank when the creature bangs against it
The creature suddenly roars at Elisa as she offers it an egg
A man breaks through a door
Accompanied by a sound effect, a masked figure appears on the previously black screen
Accompanied by a sound effect, Allison ducks down to reveal Dr. Powell watching her from the doorway
A man is shown with his neck suddenly cut open
The lights cut out suddenly
Maggie has a sudden vision of a grotesque creature which causes her to fall backwards in fear
The creature’s foot stamps on the ground
Simon opens a door and Kim rushes out
As Norah points her flashlight in front of her, the camera scrolls to reveal a dead body right in her face
While Smith and Paul investigate the back of a dead body, something suddenly jumps out from inside the body right at the camera
Emily pokes the creature, which causes it to suddenly get up and shriek
During a quiet scene, something hits the outside of the building, making a loud noise
Paul puts his ear on a wall, followed by a loud noise that startles him
There is another banging sound that startles the crew
Something hits the outside of the building again
As the crew point a flashlight to a window in the ceiling, a bunch of tentacles suddenly smash against it
Norah points her lights in front of her, which reveals a creature who swims at the camera
One of the creatures swims right in front of Norah
One of the creatures suddenly appears behind Norah as the captain shines his light on her
As the captain looks in front of him, one of the creatures swims towards the camera
Norah shines the light on a creature that suddenly attempts to grab her
The leg of one the creatures drops down in front of Norah
Norah is suddenly grabbed in the face by one of the creatures and dragged upwards
A girl narrates about her respect for her policeman father, who is looking at the camera and smiling. Suddenly, his head explodes
The mutant jumps out from behind some cops
The man in the black coat walks past in the background accompanied by a string sound effect
A farmer is pulled into the ground by an unseen entity
Val lifts a hat off the ground and Fred’s head is underneath it
The generator suddenly pops out of the ground
Jim is attacked by one of the snakes
There is a loud noise and the car begins to shake
A giant snake like creature comes out of the ground
A snake attacks the piece of wood Val is hitting the ground with
The giant snake surfaces just in front of a group of people
The pogo stick pops up out of the ground
The snake bursts through the floor of the store
Another snake bursts through the floor
A snake comes through the wall of Burt and Heather’s house
Nestor is dragged underground by one of the creatures
The building begins to cave in suddenly
One of the snake heads comes out of the water and screeches at Rhonda
The remaining snake bursts out of the ground in front of Val and Earl
Mr. Hide suddenly drops down in front of Van Helsing
One of the brides suddenly crashes out of the house as Van Helsing approaches. This is heavily telegraphed
The baby vampire’s head suddenly breaks through the cocoon
An eye appears in the man’s belongings
A man appears in front of the camera
Banging from the coffin knocks things over
Mr. Edwards turns around
Hayley looks around with the camera and a severed hand moving around on its own causes her to scream
Hayley looks up from the ground and Mr. Edwards is running straight at her
One of the soldiers reaches out for the woman who quickly grabs him on the arm
There is a sudden loud noise during a quiet scene as someone gets attacked in another room
The police officer appears behind her
The subject runs into frame and rams into the soldier from the side
A strange creature eats a man’s face
The creature reappears
A loud sound of breaking branches and movement in the trees
A sudden sound and movement of something very close
Something grabs Dave by the ankles and throws him around
Finn pulls back a tarp to reveal a wolf
Trisha opens a window blind and screams
Finn pulls on something he finds buried in the snow, and pulls up an arm
Jeanine pulls off a tarp covering a dead body
A hand reaches for Jeanine’s shoulder from behind
Pete gets dragged out of bed
Cecily suddenly appears
Jeanine suddenly appears
A blinding light suddenly turns on
A blinding light suddenly turns on
Devon is suddenly stabbed at the same time as something kicks open the guest house front door
A flashlight turns on revealing a face
Marcus gets hit by a truck
Gwen is shot in the head
As the back door is opened, Trisha is there
An arrow strikes Finn
The werewolf is hit in the back of the head with a shovel
The werewolf jumps on Emerson’s back and attacks
There is a sudden loud noise as Jack and Elsa “bump” into each other
Joshua comes up behind Jack and screams as he swings an axe at him
As Elsa is slowly walking towards the door, Liorn suddenly comes out and shoots an arrow at her
Jack is leaning against some bushes and a large hand grabs him
The werewolf suddenly roars and grabs Verussa
The werewolf jumps at Elsa
Loud noise from silence as a man plugs in a microphone
A raccoon makes a noise
Something hits the side of Kelly & Jim’s tent
Something hits the side of Kelly and Jim’s tent
Something crashes down in the forest behind Kelly
Something jumps from behind a bush at Kelly
Something makes a noise in the forest behind Kelly and Jim
Something breaks a stick in the forest near the characters
Naked woman appears moaning
Something drags camera away from frame
Anna touches the door handle and receives a sharp electric shock
A sudden gunshot as Anna looks at a skull may startle some viewers
Anna jumps down from the tree and attacks one of the hunters
Anna attacks one of the hunters from behind as he talks to Sheriff Cooper
Josh is behind the fridge door holding a knife
A creature follows Josh through the tube
Daniel hits the balcony behind the parents
Z appears in the tub in front of Beth
Multiple toy lights start flashing
Z lunges out of the wall
Z bangs on the table and startles Beth
Z is standing behind the doctor
The flashlight reveals a hanging body
Francine gets attacked from behind after discovering a body part on the ground
Carly appears suddenly behind Scott
Scott puts his hand on Chris’s shoulder
One of the mutant cannibals drops a body beside where some of the group are hiding
Chris sets off a trap as the group wander through the woods
